string.text: Dothraki Khalasar
Iron Islands
the Westermen
the Northmen
the Dothraki
the Ironborn
the Dornish
the Braavosi
The inhabitants of this area hail from the richest region of Westeros because of the abundance of gold and silver mined in the hills and crags.
The people of the North are a hardy breed. Descendents of the First Men that were ruled by the Kings of the North before Aegon's conquest.
The Dothraki are a war-like and nomadic people that move in great hordes called khalasars across the grasslands of Essos .
The Ironborn inhabit the Iron Islands and worship the Drowned God. They pillage the western coasts of Westeros as a way of life.

The Dornish are mostly descendents of a people that originated near the river Rhoyne in Essos. Princess Nymeria fled her homeland to escape the Valyrians and settled in Dorne with a huge host, explaining why most Donishmen look different than your average Westerosi.
The wealthiest of the Free Cities and home to the Iron Bank and House of Black and White.
Descendants of the First Men that were trapped north of the wall 8000 years ago. Often called wildlings by the peoples south of the wall.

Military order charged with protecting the realms of men from any threat from north of the wall. There ranks are often filled with vegabonds and criminals trying to escape the complete wrath of justice.
Houses that swore allegiance to the lords of their region, but are truly loyal to nobody.
The first Andals that arrived in Westeros settled in the area known as the Vale today. It is a harsh landscape surrounded by the Mountains of the Moon.

The people of this region live at the crossroads of several other powerful kingdoms. At the time of the Targaryen conquest, the riverlands were ruled by the Ironborn. An uprising led by House Tully assisted Aegon's conquest of the area which led to their great holdings in the area.
The inhabitants of the islands in and near Blackwater Bay that were put under the control of Stannis Baratheon by Robert after his rebellion.

The inhabitants of the land named for the frequent savage storms that ravage it's eastern coast from the Narrow Sea. This area made up it's own sovereign kingdom called The Storm Kingdom, before Aegon's conquest.
The peoples here hail from the second largest of the Seven Kingdoms behind The North. This area is the most fertile lands in all of Westeros.
These people are the descendants of the Old Empire of Ghis that was destroyed by the Valyrians in the Ghiscari wars. The cities of Slaver's Bay still practice many of their old Ghiscari customs.
People from the contested lands between the Riverlands and Stormlands, who are ruled directly by the king in King's Landing since Aegon the Conqueror.
Known as the Tall Men, they hail from the region around the river Sarne and were nearly annihilated by the Dothraki hordes.
The free city of Norvos is a true theocracy ruled by the Bearded Priests. The people's daily lives are strictly inforced by the rings of the three bells.
Descendents of those that left Valyria before a cataclysmic event destroyed that city.
People from the first of the Free Cities in Essos founded by the Valyrians.
People from one of the Free Cities in Essos. Known as the City of Sorcerers.
People from the northernmost of the Free Cities located on an island in the Shivering Sea.
People from the westernmost of the Free Cities located on the Bay of Pentos.
People from the most advanced of the Free Cities located on the Sea of Myrth.
People from the Free City located in the Stepstones.
People from the Free City located on an island in the Summer Sea.
Clans from a rugged island in the Bay of Seals. Due to lack of contact, they believe they rule themselves.
People from the Golden Empire of Yi Ti, in the far east.
People from Summer Isles, far south in the Summer Sea.
Night's Watch
Free Houses
Summer Islander

Free Houses
Summer Islander
I'm surprised you don't recognized the infamous Kingslayer. I'm Ser Jaime of House Lannister.
Oh, why, of course.
I put my sword in the back of the king I was sworn to protect, thus earning the title.
Although I am an oath breaker and murderer, not to mention my other atrocities, stabbing the Mad King was probably the most selfless act I ever committed. He would have set ablaze the entire realm.
I'm not judging you, we all have a past.
The Lion of Lannister, oh how the mighty have fallen.
My father only cares about his legacy and my sister is screwing the whole kingsguard. I've had enough the games they play in King's Landing. From this day forth, I'm just Jaime.
Oh, so you don't know who I am? I knew who you were. My little birds tell me everything.
I am none other than the Master of Whisperers my dear sir, nothing escapes my ears that happens in the realm.
Even a company of valiant heroes such as yourself and your comrades could use what I provide. It may just halt the arrow coming from the rear, or even from within.
Although I lack physical prowess, my skills are of a different sort.
But yet spiders do bite and their venom can take down even a beast of a man.
Even for my band of warriors, you may still prove useful.
Spin your web elsewhere, word games matter little with arrows flying at your head.
This better be good, or your chicken is mine. Sandor Clegane it is.
I a killer just like all the men you see here.
And don't pretend you don't enjoy it.
There nothing sweeter than seeing a prick gasp for his last breath of air.
A fellow with your size and attitude that is still alive must be a beast on the battlefield.
What the hell is your problem?
I will slice a man from nave to chop and not loose a wink of sleep. Just don't get in my way when I find my dear brother.
Only if you have a full coin purse.
I sell my sword, really my only talent other than sticking my nose two inches deep in that one over there.
The name's Bronn, although now I am an annointed knight, I may still be your man if the price is right.
So if you don't mind, I'm about to go smell the roses.
I feel you, who do you recommend?
Come on man, I thought you wanted to talk business.
Hire me, job done, no questions asked, except one, how much?
Hello sir, don't mind me, just passing through on my way to Castle Black.
I was once the heir of House Tarly, but my father banished me and deemed me unworthy.
Perhaps he's right, maybe I deserve it. I was never the valiant warrior he wanted me to be.
I'm just a pudgy, coward of a man, with my nose stuck in books instead of what a true lordly youth should do.
Don't be so hard on yourself. A father like that is no father at all.
In this grim land, cowards are easy prey.
Can I follow your caravan? You won't even know I'm there.I've learned a few things about stymying infection from all the books Ive read.
I'm Podrick Payne.
Don't judge be by my house. My cousin, the King's Justice scares me too.
I'm not much of a warrior yet, but I did slay a Kingsguard on the battlefield.
I can cook, clean and help you with your armor.
I already got a wife.
You want regret having me around. I'll make sure of that.
You got to start somewhere.
Just a smith's apprentice from Flea Bottom.
The name's Gendry. Don't know if I'm a Hill, Rivers or Storm, but a bastard without a doubt.
Every warband needs someone to knock out dents and sharpen swords if my smith's hammer is more of use to ya.
Anybody would want to get out this shit hole and say whatever to do it.
No doubt you would pulverize something.
I got the strength and endurance of an ox from pounding steel from dawn til dusk.
I haven't ever touched a battlefield, but put a war hammer in my hands and see what happens.
Why the googly eyes? You never saw a dwarve before.
I'm Tyrion of House Lannister.
I saved all of King's Landing at the Battle of the Blackwater and what thanks did I get, a demotion and a hole where my nose used to be.
I drink and know more than ever these days. Slurp!.
I do need some new armor, can you shit me out a few golden dragons.
What need do I have for an imp to guzzle all my ale.
You seem to be a clever guy, you'll figure it out.Now if you would excuse me.
My father is Selwyn if Evenfall Hall.
I'm Brienne of House Tarth.
Honor, duty and loyalty are of upmost importance of knighthood.
Although I'm not a knight, I live by this creed regardless.
What a beast of a woman you are!
People like you are hard to find, I applaud you.
If you will have me, my sword is yours till my dying breathe.
A man has no name.
For your purposes, you may call me Jaquin Hagar.
A man's path was not random, this encounter guided by the Many-faced god.
In service to the Many-faced god.
To be be unseen but yet seen a man must do.
Mysterious, I need to here more.
You're a wierd fellow.
My name is Mya Stone.
I'm a simple girl.
I once led travelers to and from the Eyrie.
Through the highest and most trecherous mountains in all of Westeros with nothing but my donkey.
A girl with good pathfinding skills should be helpful.
I could be your scout or perhaps lead a caravan. I would love see the world with you.
This world will swallow a country girl like you alive.
I am Qyburn.
I'm trained in the arts of medicine.
But lost my chains for exploring my medical curiosity in a, shall I say, unorthodox way.
My skills still remain though. The ability to cure diseases, prolong life and of course, other things you may find useful.
Keep my soldiers from dying and you are a friend of mine.
I shudder to think of atrocities you must have committed.
Keeping your men alive and untapping their complete potential, by whatever means necessary, is my utmost goal, dear sir.
I am Syrio Forel.
I was once the First Sword of Bravos.
From where I'm from, true swordsmanship is an art form. Not just hacking away as you do here.
A duel is not a test of wills but a water dance.
I need swords, no matter if the one you use is pencil thin.
There is no where to dance when you're surrounded or backed into a corner.
The First Sword of Bravos faced worse odds and yet he lives.
Freaken dimwit.
Damn, you got to have giant's blood.
You dare approach a Dothraki Blood rider!
What do you want ifak? Unless your paying for my time, I won't be interested.
My name is Rago, I was a Bloodrider for a Khal from the east. Protected his back, gave him counsel, even shared his Khaleesi. Life was grand.

After some time, my Khal thought he was much stonger than he was. The chiftik thought he could challenge the great Khal Drogo. Suffice to say, Drogo's hair has never been cut. I had warned my Khal many times he could not win. He refused to listen. Afterwards I brought his Khaleesi to Vaes Dothrak.
Then what are you doing here sulking and drinking?
Atleast you gave him that honor.
Now I travel the world, so that one day I may avenge my fallen Khal and go to the night lands with honor.
I am Xaro Xhoan Daxos
I was once one of the richest men in Qarth.
The mother of dragons refused my advice, destroyed our city's great trading economy
I left a blood stained glove on her pillow and now sail for home.
Are you mad!? You started a war with the mother of dragons?
The richest man in Quarth, perhaps your future is still bright.
Let me ask do you think the path from poverty to wealth is always pure and honorable? No? Then you and I could forge our own path together.
I am Kinvara, a priestess of the lord of light
Everyone is what they are and where they are for a reason. Terrible things happen for a reason.
Daenerys Stormborn is the one who was promised. From the fire she was reborn to remake the world... She has freed the slaves from their chains and crucified the Masters for their sins...
Her dragons are fire made flesh, a gift from the Lord of Light.... Daenerys has been sent to lead the people against the darkness in this war and in the great war still to come
You're no different than any other priestess. Insane, and following a dream.
I have heard of the prestigous ways of the priests of light.
I will spread the word of the lord of light, no matter what you believe.
I am Osha of the Freefolk
I am a spearwife. A woman warrior from the beyond the wall.
After being freed from my bonds of slavery to the north. I have been searching for my place in the world
Winter is coming, and we must prepare all that we can.
You're a wildling? We would never trust the likes of you.
Come Spearwife! Let's prepare them together!
True freedom, is only know to us wildlings.
I am Shagga of the Stone crows!
A stone crows axe is always sharp. Shagga's axes are sharpest of all!
Shagga once cut a mans head off so fast, he didn't even know til he went to brush his hair!
Shagga works for anyone for the right price.
Shagga is a monster, who should be put down
Ah! Shagga I have heard of your people, join me and we will spill lots of blood together!
Careful, or Shagga remove your manhood and feed it to the goats!
Theon Greyjoy is the name.
Let me ask you do You Know What It's Like To Be Told How Lucky You Are To Be Someone's Prisoner?
I was a prisoner of the starks for a long time. After Eddards death, I left to make my own way.
Now I wish to prove myself worthy to stand on my own, without the Starks, without my father.
You're nothing more than a common pirate, with even less honor.
Follow me into battle, and your name will be remembered.
My Sword Is Yours, In Victory And Defeat, From This Day Until My Last Day.
Myranda, from the Dreadfort.
I have a great set of skills, from tending dogs, to warming your bed.
After my lover showed he was more interested in others, I split my own way.
My Father was a kennelmaster at the dreadfort. Mmm. Have you ever seen a body after the dogs have been at it? Not so pretty.
I can't imagine having you by my side.
Come, even if you don't warm my bed, there is plenty of others in my party who need that.
*She chuckles* This is going to be so much fun!
Hizdahr zo Loraq
After my fathers crucification in Mareen, I set out to find allies to help restore the city to it's past glory
What is done is done. I am a servant of Meereen; a servant who does not wish to see its traditions eradicated.
Perhaps you would help restore my great city?
Slavery is not something I would support in my vision of the world.
Maybe you could help guide my hand to learn the customs of Mareen?
Then let us build it together.
They call me Locke.
All those lords and ladies, still think that the only thing that matters is gold.
That his gold couldn't save him. His noble name couldn't save him.
I am one of the best hunters of the north. I have served the Boltons, and for the right reason I may serve you.
I have no use for a cut throat like yourself.
You and I could see the rise of a new empire, where all the nobles of westeros must bend the knee to common men.
Sounds like a dream I would sign up for.
I am Maester Cressen.
I served Stannis Baratheon for many years, advising in science and medicine.
He turned away from the light of the seven. Listening to the guidance of a red witch.
Now I look to find myself in a new station, where my advice is wanted.
What use do I have for an old man?
Medicine and Science, who couldn't use an advisor of your stature?
My Gratitude for appreciating my wisdom my lord.
They call me Jacelyn Ironhand.
I was knighted by the late Robert Baratheon for my valor at the siege of Pyke
I've protected queens, kings, and all sorts of noble men.
Now, I sit here wasting, drinking this ale.
I don't need a cripple.
A knight shouldn't be wasting away in this crappy tavern. Can you still fight?
I would protect you at all costs, honor means all to a man of my stature.
I am Quentyn Martell
I spent my younger days fostered by the Yronwoods to settle a blood debt.
I was once promised the throne of Dorne, fate changed the plans though. Now I must obtain glory.
The hero sets out with his friends and companions, faces dangers, comes home triumphant. Only some of his companions don't return at all. The hero never dies, though. I must be the hero
This hero has no need for a Martell.
Come join us then, there will be plenty of glory to be had.
This will be my grand adventure!
They call me Little Finger.
Chaos isnt a pit. Chaos is a ladder. Many who try to climb it fail, and never get to try again.
The fall breaks them. And some are given a chance to climb, but refuse. They cling to the realm, or the gods, or love... illusions.
Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is
Climb your way back to the gutter and leave me be.
Perhaps we will climb that ladder together Little Finger? Riches and nobility all lie in my destiny.
Then we shall climb to the sun.
I am Yoren a wandering crow.
one day, Willem came riding back into town. And I buried an axe so deep into Willems skull they had to bury him with it. Willems horse got me to the Wall and Ive been wearing black ever since.
I am on a quest to recruit more men to the night's watch.
Maybe you wish to bring honor to your name? Take the black?
What in the gods makes you think I would take the black?
Join my cause, and I will make it my mission to provide you with fresh men to defend the wall.
As long as I can try to acquire more men to defend the wall, and a belly full of food. I'll protect your back.
A word? I know lots of words. Tell me which your highness wants to hear, and Nimble Dick will say it..
I like to see a king dance, hey-nonny hey-nonny hey-nonny ho..You ever hear of Ser Clarence Crabb?

Ser Clarence Crabb, I said. I got his blood in me. He was eight feet tall and so strong he could uproot pine trees and chuck them half a mile. No horse could bear his weight so he rode an aurochs. His wife was a woods witch.

Whenever Ser Clarence killed a man, he'd fetch his head back home and his wife would kiss it on the lips and bring it back t' life. Lords, they were, and wizards and famous knights and pirates. One was king o' Duskendale. They gave old Crabb good counsel. Being they was just heads, they couldn't talk real loud, but they never shut up neither. When you're a head, talking's all you got to pass the day. So Crabb's keep got named the Whispers.
You're an absolute nutter.
You know what! You're the kind of Dick I could use in my party! Let's go!
Old Dick's a harmless fellow. Chivalrous as a knight, and honest as the day is long.
My name is Ser Harlan Blackhare
You got the money, I'll do the job
It's a grim world out there, I'll do what I have to do.
Patch your wounds, manage your house, even sell your wares.
Alright, I just need your sword
Aren't you a pleasure to talk to.
Not trying to be the hero, that's your story.
My name don't matter
You got the money, I'll do the job
It's a grim world out there, I'll do what I have to do.
Patch your wounds, manage your house, even sell your wares.
Alright, I just need your sword
Aren't you a pleasure to talk to.
Not trying to be the hero, that's your story.
My name is Ser Adrian Fairwood
You got the money, I'll do the job
It's a grim world out there, I'll do what I have to do.
Patch your wounds, manage your house, even sell your wares.
Alright, I just need your sword
Aren't you a pleasure to talk to.
Not trying to be the hero, that's your story.
WUN .... WUN
CRUSH ... ENEMIES
RIP .. APART
ARROWS .. LIKE SPLINTERS.
How could I say no
NOUGH .. SAID.
You look like someone who could use a sturdy shield at your side!
My name is Cregan Whytcross, I'm a sellsword for hire.
For a small sum of coin, I'd keep you or your family safe just like my ancestors did back during the Skagosi Rebellions.
The first ever Whytcross died defending the young Lord of Winterfell.
Thanks for the history lesson, it must be good to know you have strong roots that you can be proud of.
Alright, I just need your shield at my side. I hope you're as good as you say.
Aye, I hope to make my ancestors proud.
My name is Benjen Stark, a sworn bother of the Night's Watch.
If you're traveling beyond the wall, you'll be needing a guide.
You're lucky if you only run into ice spiders, shadow cats and direwolves.
The Others, a different story.
Welcome, you seem like the man for the job.
Ice spiders, yeah right.
We get going at first light.
My name is Daemon Blackfyre
You got the money, I'll do the job
It's a grim world out there, I'll do what I have to do.

Alright, I just need your sword

These soldiers are just doing what they are told whichever banner they fight under.
They all will get care and compassion from me.
I can definitely use a healer my lady.
Why help the enemy if you want the wars to stop, they need to be defeated.
Help that I will do, for your troops and prisoners.

Not trying to be the hero, that's your story.
I am the rightful ruler of Westeros and I will reclaim the throne my ancestors built.
The usurper's son with bend the first, then his brothers.
The wolf and the viper will be tamed also and I will do what I am meant to do, rule.
There will never be peace until I avenge my father!
Tywin's armies will fall one by one.
I will have Joffrey's head on a pike and slaughter every Lannister I see from here to King's Landing.
I'm the richest man in Westeros, my grandson sits the Iron Throne. All political conversation revolves around House Lannister.
The young wolf is brave, I give him that.
But he's in a strange land and northmen don't last long down here.
I'm sworn to House Arryn.
But House Royce hasn't always been. We have the blood of the first men and were here before the Andal houses.
We were the Bronze Kings of the mountains and ruled the entire Vale in years past.
House Tyrell is one of the only houses to rival the wealth and prestige of Lannister.
We control the Mander, most the farmland and can call a fleet to rival that of the Royal Fleet in King's Landing.
But besides all that, we will remain loyal to the true and rightful king of the seven kingdoms.
We are the ironborn. We're not subjects, we're not slaves.
We do not plow the field or toil in the mine.
We take what is ours.
House Nymeros Martell are the proud rulers of Dorne.
We joined our house with Queen Nymeria of the Rhoynar, so we do things differently than they do in King's Landing.
We will enjoy the peace and prosperity down here for now, our isolation has made us strong.
I will kill the men in iron suits and tear down their stone houses!
I will rape their women, take their children as slaves, and bring their broken gods back to Vaes Dothrak!
This I vow, I swear before the Mother of the Mountains as the stars look down in witness!
The Riverlands will not let the atrocities in King's Landing slide.
We are prepared to join my nephew when the time comes.
We will scatter the field with lion blood.
We are the lords of the Crossing. Our power is not matched in the Riverlands.
We are the lords of the Crossing. Our power is not matched in the Riverlands.
I'm the Lord of the Crossing. The Tully's may be the lord of the Trident, but no one is crossing this bridge and passing my gates without paying homage to me.
We are the lords of the Crossing. Our power is not matched in the Riverlands.
Being the daughter of Warden of the South has its perks, but to be the queen....
Everyone hates Stannis. I'm the king the people deserve and my armies will make that happen.
I'm sworn to King Renly until my last breath.
I'm the rightful king of the seven kingdoms. If my powder-puff brother doesn't step down, he will be crushed also.
The night is dark and full of terrors.
I'm the ruler of Volantis and the most influential Triarch on the Rhoyne. Kings from the east and west all know my name.
In my family we say: A naked man has few secrets; a flayed man, none.
Long live King Stannis!
If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.
I love the onion knight, could you fetch him for me?
We are the lords of the Crossing. Our power is not matched in the Riverlands.
Forget the line of succession, Renly is the king the people deserve.
Valar Morghulis.
I believe in Queen Danaerys, she's done everything she said she was going to do so far.
House Corbray is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
House Corbray is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
It often comforts me to think that even in war's darkest days, in most places in the world absolutely nothing is happening.
House Hunter is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
We will stand with House Tully, until the bitter end if need be.
House Hunter is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
I'm the Lord of Driftmark and a king of the seas, like my ancestors before me.
I'm sworn to the Lord of the Mander, Mace Tyrell. Where he goes, I'll follow.
I'm sworn to the Lord of the Mander, Mace Tyrell. Where he goes, I'll follow.
I'm the Sealord of Braavos, I will protect this city and it's citizens as I am charged to do.
Some say my uncle is the greatest swordsman in the seven kingdoms, but I heard he fleed to serve a foriegn queen.
I'm the King of Lorath, this region bows to me.
We will uphold our vows to House Tully and fight until our last breath if need be. By the way, steer clear of the Brackens, they are bad news.
We will uphold our vows to House Tully and fight until our last breath if need be.
We are sworn to the Lord Paramount of the Trident, but we awefully close to crown here.
We are sworn to the Lord Paramount of the Trident, but we awefully close to crown here.
Stannis is a good man, he's saved my life more times than I can count.

I've been all over the world, my boy, and everywhere I go people tell me about the 'true gods', they all think the found the right one. The one true god is what's between a woman's legs. And better yet a queen's legs.
We bow to no man north of the wall, the freefolk made me their leader because the trusted me.
Were the King of Salt and Rock goes, we follow.
I'm the Lord Captain of the Iron Fleet, nothing in the seas can rival our might.
My only goal is to not die so far from the sea.
Were the King of Salt and Rock goes, we follow.
I am the storm, my lord. The first storm and the last.
I would say you know nothing, from how pretty you dress and your pretty hair. You need a touch of the true north in your life.
Have you ever tasted crow?
We serve the king in the north, as long as I deem his judgement worthy.
Walking's good, fighting's better, fucking's best!
Were the King of Salt and Rock goes, we follow.
Have you ever heard of the Sword of the Morning? He was my uncle and one of the greatest warriors ever.
I've been kingsguard and queensguard, but still now I could slice through your lot like carving a cake, if need be.
Don't underestimate the power of the Sand Snakes, it won't end well for you.
I'm the ruler of Myr, the craftmanship of my subjects is unmatched, and we put it to good use.
I'm the ruler of Pentos, many a king and queen have passed through these gates.
Don't underestimate the power of the Sand Snakes, it won't end well for you.
I'm on my way to King's Landing. The Lannisters aren't their debts.
Don't underestimate the power of the Sand Snakes, it won't end well for you.
We serve at the pleasure of the Prince of Dorne.
We swore oaths to the Prince of Dorne, but in times past, oaths were sworn to us in this area.
I'm the ruler of Lys, a paradise in the Summer Sea. Even the Valyrians saw her beauty.
We serve at the pleasure of the Prince of Dorne.
I'm the ruler of Tyrosh, we have honed our skills in both the land and sea in the disputed lands and stepstones.
The only way to keep the people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy.
I lead the vanguard for the Warden of the South, Mace Tyrell.
Nothing can touch me or my son a top the Eyrie, and my loyal knights of the vale in the field would see that it never came to an ill-advised siege.
I don't see why the crown and the sept can't work together to make King's Landing a better place.
I serve at the pleasure of Lady Lysa Arryn.
This King's Landing air doesn't suit me, perhaps somewhere warmer.
I lead the vanguard along side my father for the Warden of the South, Mace Tyrell.
Do you want to fly, I can make that happen.
House Lannister has the gold and the leadership to out class all others, if I do say so myself.
I can call up a fleet to rival that of the royal in a moments notice to serve the Warden of the South, Mace Tyrell.

A man who sees nothing has no use for his eyes, cut them out and give them to your next outrider. Tell him you hope that four eyes might see better than too ... and if not, the man after him will have six.
A Stark must always be at Winterfell, although something is calling me north as far north as north can go.
I'll see to it that winter comes for House Frey.
I'm not a lady. Never have been. That's not me.
I'm the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch, we are the shield that guards the realms of men.
I'd wipe that smug look off your face in ten minutes in the training yard of Castle Black.
I can't believe I was so smitten by King Joffrey. I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.
When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives.
I swore vows to the King of the North, Robb Stark.
House Stark will survive this treachery, I'll see to it.
I'm a bastard, serving in the honorable Night's Watch like my uncle and many before me. Yet I do feel there's more to my story somehow.
I know no king but the king in the north whose name is Stark.
I know no king but the king in the north whose name is Stark.
Politics? Thats why I have my small council, so they can handle the tedious and mundane.
Get out of my face with that political hogwash, the only thing that matters is what the king says.
Danaerys is my queen, I will give my life for hers without batting a eye.
Could care less about it, but if you ever see these eyes pale blue, put a couple fire arrows through them.
He serve at the pleasure of the King in the North.
Where the King of the North goes, my axe follows.
Long live the King in the North!
We follow the King in the North, for now.
The gods forbid the others take my children, nothing more terrifying to me.
I will ride with the riverlords into battle, no matter the price.
We ride with House Tully for now.
King Stannis is my king and the legitimate king by the laws of gods and man.
Hail King Stannis!
Long live the King in the North!
Long live the King in the North!
I would love to see King's Landing!
We ride with the king in the north, long live the king ...
We ride with the king in the north for the time being.
Long live the King in the North!
We ride with the king in the north for the time being.
We sail with the king of salt and rock.
We sail along side in the Iron fleet along side the Greyjoys.
House Coldwater is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
House Waxley is sworn to the Warden of the East, Lysa Arryn, until Robin come of age.
We are sworn to the Warden of the West ...
Have you seen the Young Wolfe? Oh my, I'm smitten.
We ride with House Tully for now. Stay away from those Blackwoods, they are a scourge on the Riverlands.
We ride with House Tully, the Lord Paramount of the Trident.
We ride with House Tully, the Lord Paramount of the Trident.
Hail King Stannis!
We are swore to King Renly, but my father is in the riverlands leading the Brotherhood without Banners, I hear.
I swore vows to the Warden of the South.
I swore vows to the Warden of the South.
I will follow the House Tyrell into battle.
We serve at the pleasure of the Prince of Dorne.
House Jordayne swore vows to the prince of Dorne.
House Qorgyle swore vows to the prince of Dorne.
The High King of Sarnor bows before no man, but those dothraki savages surely humbled my ancestors.
I am the blood of the dragon, its time to claim what is rightfully mine.
I raised young griff like he was mine, now he's my king.
We sail along side in the Iron fleet along side the Greyjoys.
The Skagosi rule themselves, we know no king but the one's residing in our frozen halls.
We ride with House Tully, the Lord Paramount of the Trident, no matter the cost.
The Golden Company will forever back Young Griff as he claims his birthright.
Well done, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Keep the money and wine coming our way, and there's no foe in Westeros or Essos you need fear.[ib:convo_approving]
You will not be dissapointed {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You will not find better warriors in all Westeros or even Essos.[ib:convo_approving]
